amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 115-186 to prohibit any loss of funds for wild-fire suppression.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Beyer.
